page.title: 18Leisure,Whitsbury + Breamore
page.content: includes a mizmaze. Over 50% of leisure activities are home-based,such as watching T.V., listening to radio and records,DIY, gardening,reading,knitting and car maintenance.Outside of the home, informal activities range from the younger generation using the few open spaces for play,to the older inhabitants enjoying country walks. Evening activities for adults also include pub and club visits. More formal activities all involve travelling outside the village.The nearest swimming pool used is at Godshill(4to6 miles),nearest sports center is Ringwood(8to10 miles),and the nearest cinema,theatre,golf club,bingo hall and many other clubs are found at Salisbury(9to10 miles). The nearest adult education centre is at Fordingbridge(2to4 miles away).
